name: Wild Ski
description:
WILD SKI IS THE ULTIMATE SNOW-PACKED, FUN-FILLED ADVENTURE!

Join this cool cast of characters as they leave the Savannah to visit the slopes and race through obstacles. People of all ages will love cruising down the hill for an endless ride of fast paced thrills!

* Halsey the Hippo – Choose me to ski down the hill of fun!
* Lukas the Lion – Pick me to shred this mountain!
* Klara the Kangaroo – Go for me if you want to jump and jive with style!
* Kris the Koala – Race with me and help me get those points!

EASY TO PLAY - EXHILARATING TO STAY!

* Stay on the slopes as long as you can as you tilt left & right to move through the obstacles!
* Swipe up and down to control speed!
* Tap to throw snowballs at the surprise mountain wildlife!
* Jump over bumps and cliffs!
* Randomly generated slopes. Never have the same run twice!
* Get power-ups and upgrades!
* Win trophies!

HIT THE SLOPES NOW!!!
